name: Group 17 - The Impossible Ice Puzzle
description:
Disclaimer: 'Start' button within the main menu does not function within this build. Use the' Level Select' button and select 'Level 1'  to begin the game.    

A 2D puzzler about an ice cube collecting coins and keys but avoid melting suns and ghosts to complete the levels. Feel like a challenge? Try the time attack mode. 

Controls: Use W: to move up  A: to move left  S: to move down D: to move right 

A game by:

Luke Baldwin

Andrei-Marian Patru 

Yurii Skorobogatko

Daniel Marsh
